multiple_pulse:
  input_file: output-simple/CW/Tvst-10 micrometer.txt
  output_config_file: output-simple/MP/CONFIG-10 micrometer.txt
  output_file: output-simple/MP/Tvst-10 micrometer.txt
  output_file_format: null
  pulses:
  - arrival_time: 0.0 s
    duration: 0.01 s
    scale: 1.0
  - arrival_time: 0.02 s
    duration: 0.01 s
    scale: 2.0
  time:
    max: 0.075 s
    resolution: 0.00019999999999999998 s
